mapper.select: select book_id from book where isbn = #{isbn}

select b.book_id, bookname, isbn, authors, publisher, book_image_URL, publication_year, class_no, d.department, loan_count, book_count from book b,book_count bc, department d where b.book_id = bc.book_id and d.department_id = bc.department_id and d.department_id = #{department_id} order by book_count desc, loan_count desc;

select b.book_id, bookname, isbn, authors, publisher, book_image_URL, publication_year, class_no, loan_count, favorite_date from book b,favorite f where b.book_id = f.book_id and member_id = #{member_id} order by favorite_date desc, loan_count desc

select b.book_id, bookname, isbn, authors, publisher, book_image_URL, publication_year, class_no, loan_count, search_date from book b,search_history sh where b.book_id = sh.book_id and member_id = #{member_id} order by search_date desc, loan_count desc
